content.question: The Röttgen Pietà was intended to elicit which of the following emotional responses from viewers?

choices.label: Awe, because of the application of jewels and gold leaf
Empathy, through the contorted and twisted body of Christ
Admiration of its precise anatomical naturalism
Reverence, due to its monumental scale

content.answer: Empathy, through the contorted and twisted body of Christ
